map.action: var 'syncEditMode' ? (sampler_sync 1 ? sampler_sync 1 off : sampler_sync 1 on) & set 'syncEditMode' 0 : set 'syncEditMode' 1

var_equal 'encoderBrowser' 1 ? (param_greater 0 ? browser_scroll +1 : browser_scroll -1) : var_equal 'activeDeck' 1 ? (param_greater 0 ? deck 1 loop_half : deck 1 loop_double) : (param_greater 0 ? deck 2 loop_half : deck 2 loop_double)
effect_select 'sampler' "Filter" & param_equal 0 ? effect_active 'sampler' off : effect_active 'sampler' on
effect_select 'sampler' "Echo" & param_equal 0 ? effect_active 'sampler' off : effect_active 'sampler' on
effect_select 'sampler' "Reverb" & param_equal 0 ? effect_active 'sampler' off : effect_active 'sampler' on
effect_select 'sampler' "Distortion" & param_equal 0 ? effect_active 'sampler' off : effect_active 'sampler' on
param_equal 1 ? deck sampler pfl off : deck sampler pfl on
sampler_loaded 1 ? (sampler_play 1 ? get constant 0.52 : get constant 0.34) : get constant 0.57
sampler_loaded 2 ? (sampler_play 2 ? get constant 0.52 : get constant 0.34) : get constant 0.57
